html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen to make cooking less stressful or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone.  Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting nerds at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top 10 Amazon deals right now, including a customer-favorite tooth whitening kit, top-rated artificial Christmas trees and one of our favorite pairs of Apple earbuds, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. Need gift ideas? We've got you covered there, too. 

► Holiday Gift Guide 2021:  100 amazing gifts for every type of person and budget

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The 10 best Amazon deals you can get today

1. 25% off: This tooth whitening kit our readers love  

Give your smile some extra sparkle this holiday season with the Crest 3D Whitestrips glamorous white teeth whitening kit, currently down from $39.99 to just $29.99, the lowest price we've ever seen. This best-selling dental kit includes 16 standard whitening treatments designed to stay put even when talking or drinking water. Also included are two one-hour express whitening treatments, perfect for quickly brightening up your smile before holiday parties. When used consistently, Crest says these strips whiten up to 25 times better than leading whitening toothpastes. 

Get the Crest 3D Whitestrips Glamorous White Teeth Whitening Kit for $29.99 (Save $10)

2. As much as 70% off: Christmas trees and more

Planning on decorating your home for the holidays this weekend? We've got you covered with epic Amazon deals on Christmas trees and holiday décor with savings of as much as 70% on select items. One popular pick is the National Tree Company 6-foot Dunhill Fir artificial Christmas tree. Designed to look and feel just like the real thing, this artificial tree has a 46-inch base diameter and hundreds of pre-attached branches. Better still, the tree is made with hypo-allergenic and fire-resistant materials. Normally retailing for $181.24, you can take home this holiday essential today for just $102.98—a $78.26 savings and the lowest price we've seen since June.  

Save up to 70% on Christmas Trees and Holiday Décor

3. Save $70: Some of our favorite earbuds

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for one of the lowest prices we've ever seen. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $179—a $70 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $179 (Save $70)

4. Up to 37% off: Top-rated Samsung monitors  

Refresh your home office set up before 2022 with markdowns of as much as 37% on top-tier Samsung monitors. One popular pick? The Samsung Odyssey G5 series 27-inch gaming monitor, down from $499.99 to just $449.99. This monitor is designed to have best-in-class visuals and fast refresh rates and response times. 

Save up to 37% on Samsung Monitors 

5. Down $30: This compact food sealer

Start prepping holiday meals now with the FoodSaver VS0150 PowerVac compact vacuum sealing machine. This top-rated vacuum sealer is equipped with two settings for wet and dry foods and is designed to keep food fresh and prevent freezer burn. The brand claims the vacuum sealer uses 35% less bag waste compared to other models and can keep food up to five times longer compared to traditional storage methods. 

Get the FoodSaver VS0150 PowerVac Compact Vacuum Sealing Machine for $59.98 (Save $30.01)

6. Up to 42% down: Top-tier robot vacuums and mops

If you're tired of constantly cleaning up dropping pine needles from your Christmas tree, a robot vacuum could help. Luckily, right now, you can scoop up some of our favorite iRobot Roombas for a deep discount at Amazon. During the sale, customers can shop robot vacuums and mops at up to 42% off. Looking to keep your home in tip-top shape for the holidays? Consider the iRobot Roomba j7+, the best Roomba we've ever tested, down from $849 to $649—the cheapest price we've ever seen. We think this robot vacuum is iRobot's best Roomba yet and found it to have excellent navigation and cleaning capabilities. In testing, the j7+ easily maneuvered around furniture and picked up just as much dirt as a full-sized vacuum. 

Save up to 42% on iRobot Roomba Robot Vacuums and Mops  

7. A 29% markdown: These collapsible lanterns 

For those looking to stock up on camping equipment or gear up on emergency lights, this 4 pack of LED lanterns from Vont could be a great choice. These best-selling battery powered lights are waterproof and collapsible and even come with a lifetime warranty. According to the brand, the bright light can cut through 360 degrees of darkness, easily lighting up an entire room or tent.  

Get the Vont LED Camping Lantern 4 Pack for $19.99 (Save $8)  

8. Under $20: This top-rated popcorn popper

Upgrade your Christmas movie marathons with theater-quality popcorn using the Ecolution original microwave micro-pop popcorn popper. Usually ringing up for $19.99, you can take home this 3-quart popcorn maker for as little as $15.99 for the red version—while this isn't the lowest price we've seen this holiday season, it's only $2 more than the Black Friday tag and still 20% off it's typical list price. Designed to make healthier popcorn without oil or butter, the brand claims this dishwasher-safe popper can make perfect popcorn in as little as 3 minutes in the microwave. 

Get the Ecolution Original Microwave Micro-Pop Popcorn Popper from $15.99 (Save $1.40 to $4)

9. Under $25: One of our favorite Nerf guns

At Reviewed, we love Nerf guns, and one of our all-time favorites is the Nerf Modulus Recon MKIII blaster, currently on sale for $24.99 at Amazon, $6.50 off the full $31.49 list price. This 4-in-1 Nerf gun includes 12 dark clips and 12 Nerf darts. In testing we appreciated the detachable dart shield and found the blaster to have a long range, although ultimately it was harder to load than other Nerf models we tested. If you're looking for even more Nerf fun, you can shop tons of other models at up to 22% off right now. 

Get the Nerf Modulus Recon MKIII Blaster for $24.99 (Save $6.50)

10. Save $10: This $50 gift card

Whether you want to treat yourself to a tasty dinner before the holidays or gift a meal to the foodie in your life, a Brinker gift card can be a great buy—especially today. Right now you can pick up a $50 Brinker gift card—valid for use at Chili's Grill & Bar, On The Border and Maggiano's Little Italy—for just $40. Be sure to shop fast, this lightening deal is selling fast! 

Get the $50 Brinker Gift Card for $40 (Save $10)

Amazon deals you may have missed

1. Tile Bluetooth Tracker Starter 2-Pack 

Never lose your wallet and keys again by picking up the Tile Starter Pack. Normally listed for $54.99, this two-pack of Tile Mate and Tile Slim trackers (they make great gifts this holiday season!) can be yours for $39.99 thanks to a 27% discount. When we tested the latest models of Tile's trackers, we appreciated the different sizes, perfect for attaching to keyrings or slipping into wallets. This model can also be set up through iOS and Android, and louder built-in speakers means you can find the Tile items in even the noisiest environments. 

Get the Tile Bluetooth Tracker Starter 2-Pack for $39.99 (Save $15)

2. Stasher Platinum Silicone Reusable Storage Bags

If you're taking food on the go or just want to keep some snacks fresh, you could do worse than the Stasher Platinum food storage bags. Normally listed for $54.99, you can get a four-pack of these silicone bags for as low as $35.99. We found the Stasher Platinum line to be one of the best reusable sandwich bags thanks to its sturdy silicone build and ability to hold everything from small snacks to even small toiletries. The bags are also good for cooking methods like sous vide and are even oven safe. 

Get the Stasher Platinum Silicone Reusable Storage Bags, 4-Pack from $35.99 (Save $13.75 to $19)

3. Apple AirPods (3rd Generation)

Right now you can get the third-generation Apple AirPods for $139.99—a 22% discount from its $179 list price thanks to a $9.02 discount on the product page and an additional $29.99 price cut at checkout. When we tested the latest models of the AirPods, we were impressed with the sleeker design compared to its older models, more accurate bass and solid instrumental detail you hear in the sound output. You'll get six hours of battery life in each charge and the accompanying charging case has about 24 hours of power when fully charged.

Get the Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) for $139.99 at checkout (Save $39.01)

4. Marshal Mode II True Wireless Earbuds

If you've seen Marshall's brand name on the guitar amps of your favorite bands, this is the deal for you. The brand's Mode II earbuds are on sale for $144.86—a 19% discount from its regular price tag of $179.99. The earbuds offer 5 hours of wireless playback on a single charge and the case itself, styled similar to Marshall's beloved amps, lets you get four full recharges at a time. The buds also come with four ear-tip sizes to find the right fit for your ears and are also water-resistant. 

Get the Marshall Mode II True Wireless Earbuds for $144.86 (Save $35.13)

5. Zwilling Stainless Steel Steak Knife Set of 8

If you're shopping for gifts for the home chef in your family, put them on the cutting edge with this Zwilling steak knife set. Typically listed for $160, this 8-piece set of stainless steel knives is now available for a whopping 68% discount at $49.99. Zwilling says the knives are made with four-inch serrated blades with tapered grips for a comfortable feel. It also comes in an attractive wooden box for display.

Get the Zwilling Stainless Steel Steak Knife Set of 8 for $49.99 (Save $110.01)

Other noteworthy Amazon deals we found 

  • Shop select party games and get 3 for the price of 2
  • Save up to 20% on Zippo products
  • Save up to 29% on Bose earbuds
  • Brita 20-Ounce Stainless Steel Water Filter Bottle from $16.15 (Save $2 to $10.84)
  • Nuun Sport Electrolyte Drink Tablets 4-Pack for $21.35 (Save $6.61)
  • SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless Gaming Mouse for $24.88 (Save $25.11)
  • LifeStraw Personal Water Filter, 2-Pack for $25.98 (Save $13.97)
  • Amazon Echo Dot (4th Generation) for $29.99 (Save $20)
  • 6 Months of Kindle Unlimited for $30 (Save $29.94)
  • Kasa Smart Bulbs 1000 Lumens 4-Pack for $36.99 (Save $8)
  • Blue Yeti USB Microphone for $89.99 (Save $40)
  • Rockpoint Axess Computer Desk with Keyboard Tray from $111.57 (Save $11.84 to $29.25)
  • Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness Tracker for $129.95 (Save $50)
  • DeWalt 20-Volt Max Cordless Drill Combo Kit for $139 (Save $60)
  • Respawn 200 Racing Style Gaming Chair from $148.17 (Save $80 to $141.82)
  • DeskCycle 2 Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser for $149 with coupon (Save $50)
  • Keurig K-Supreme Plus Coffee Maker for $169.99 (Save $20)
  • iRobot Roomba 692 for $174.99 (Save $125)
  • Bose Sleepbuds II for $199 (Save $50)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
